profile.title: Professional profile
profile.introduction: Curious and passionate Web Developer with more than 5 years of experience in the design and development of web projects. Adept of functional programming and the KISS principle, I like the code to be well structured, clear and commented. Reactive and with a strong team spirit, my help is often appreciated to solve problems and to take on new challenges.

list.title: Front-end developer
details: Development of a Drag & Drop process management interface in Microsoft SharePoint Online.
Display and edit processes represented as a diagram.
Modify a process by adding activities of different types.
Manage connections between different activities.
Management of business elements linked to these activities (documents, roles, products, etc.).

details: Redesign of the app according to the new mock-ups.
Integration of the paid part of the application with Stripe.
Drag & drop content downloads.
Edit uploaded content by adding text, adjusting volume and selecting a part for videos.
Set up automated email reminders at different times in a project.
Generate a printable PDF containing a QR Code to access and participate to a project.
Setting up a file download service.

details: Development and maintenance of an ecosystem of customer support applications, including a back office using an API rest, an intelligent chat module, a dynamic FAQ display module and a server for the chat and FAQ module.
Deployment of various applications on Heroku and AWS using CI/CD pipelines.
Design and development of Botfuel Dialog, an open source SDK for developing chatbots.
Implementation of the Botfuel Dialog SDK as a web application usable by everyone.
Maintenance and translation of the company's website.
Development of features and maintenance of a chatbot client project.
Development of a proxy allowing the public, secure and unified use of the different APIs of the company.
Development of modules integrating the company customer support solution on Magento, Wordpress and Shopify websites.
